item.description:
This meetup starts Friday January 9th and ends Sunday January 11th. The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett, NH this weekend and guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fees. We’re within minutes of Attitash, Bretton Woods and Wildcat, so people will be out skiing or boarding at one of these areas, most likely Wildcat where the FNX Snoriders will be having an après ski event. There will also be some local après ski events in the afternoon and evening at nearby ski clubs.

Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.
Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in and say hello
item.name: January 9th to 11th at the Brettl-Hupfers in NH
